alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 10:58AM EST until March 10 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River from Rivervale to Williams. White River from Edwardsport to Hazleton. .Minor flooding is ongoing across western and southern Indiana. Flooding is expected to end early this weekend on the East Fork White, but persist on the lower White into early next week and lower Wabash through the middle of next week. Additional precipitation over the weekend is not expected to be enough to impact river levels. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water is over most local roads in the flood plain. Be safe...Turn Around and Do Not Drown. Agricultural lands flood. Water covers Bedford Boat Club grounds. Access to higher campground spots at the Bedford Boat Club are blocked by high water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 20.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM EST Friday was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early this afternoon and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
